alert.note: Alert for Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 20 at 9:41AM PST until January 22 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM FRIDAY TO NOON PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Yosemite NP outside of the valley and Upper San Joaquin River. * WHEN...From 7 AM Friday to noon PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Avoid forested areas as damaging wind gusts will blow down trees and branches. Stay clear of power lines. Secure outdoor objects.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
